channel.title: Burning Hearts Forever, Spirit of '77, The Fall of Delta Green
channel.description:
On the new Gauntlet Podcast ﻿@Auzumel_S and ﻿@edige23﻿ talk with @Haladir about these games, storygame techniques with OSR, and more.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/burning-hearts-forever-spirit-of-77-the-fall-of-delta-green
The Gauntlet Podcast Index: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-podcast-index.html
